title: LARPGATE - Angel Ad Vocation  (Bris Edition)
description:
Thankyou Shadow Cabal!
Word on Fire is his Blog:  wordonfire.org/resources/article/how-to-live-a-meaningful-life/33289/
Alien Salience Project:  /playlist?list=PLlYtuOmeuiNt2fU5iBWjmn34ZVElvTXtk

TIMESTAMPS:
00:03:22  Intro
00:04:22  Previously on ...
00:05:55  Finding Hezikiah⁠‎ 
00:07:44  Save vs Mind Control
00:09:44  Third Monkey Splicing
00:13:31  Subscribers etc.
00:15:33  Salsa 
00:16:42  Nap Kin Ring Web Sling
00:18:18  Joint Attention
00:19:55  Solomon Says
00:24:33  Sad & Solution
00:29:15  Attention Starvation Precedents
00:31:33  Rail Change
00:33:44  Vixen Wrenching Recap
00:37:44  Ad Vocation
00:39:33  Five minutes of Silence

Sources:
Livestream:  /watch?v=mmIuZhng2dA
Pageau Pentecost:  /watch?v=S-tbMQMCQlI
Symbolic World Vvk:  /watch?v=Y9ZaFNIH0co
Grail Country Vvk:  /watch?v=EBzZcFYixLg
Salsa:  /watch?v=dkJFNDw8X2s
GenZ Humor:  /watch?v=oVlspd9hxFA
Girl Fight:  /watch?v=Xq-UpjLbu6Y
Apocalypse of Meaning:  /watch?v=FCvQsqSCWjA

Fresh Petkau:  /watch?v=hozPGQps0zA

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: 
https://discord.gg/pyb67nVB
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
